title: Make slot accumulators resizable
description: Currently our slot accumulators are not resizable and we need to know the maximum number of slots beforehand.  This represents a problem for some types of faceting (like numeric faceting) if we don't know the actual number of values.  This will also help implement a sparse faceting option in the future.
